description: XOD library to interface with the Amperka Octofet 8-channel power switches.
name: octofet

@/cs-pin-write.description: Sets the state ("on" or "off") for the CS pin Octofet is connected to.

@/example-2-in-chain.description: Example to set the state of 16 power switches on three Octofet devices connected in a daisy-chain.

@/example-3-in-chain.description: Example to set the state of 24 power switches on three Octofet devices connected in a daisy-chain.

@/example-manual-chain.description: Example of Amperka Octofet board to sets the state off all power switches on multiple Octofet devices connected in a daisy-chain.

S1MA8cJP8.description: Example of Octofet to sets state off all power switches. Octofet boards connected in a daisy-chain.

@/example-simple.description: Example of Amperka Octofet board to sets the state off 8 power switches on single Octofet device.

@/octofet.description:
The quick start node that represents the Octofet board, 
which sets the state ("on" or "off") of all 8 power switches (a.k.a. «channels»).

SkZtiB5kD8.description: The clock pin used to clock pulses which synchronize data transmission generated by the master. It is marked П on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
SkZtiB5kD8.label: SCK

SklForqyD8.description: The MOSI (Master Out Slave In) pin used to send data to the peripherals. It is marked DI on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
SklForqyD8.label: MOSI

SktiBckvL.description: The chip select (also known as slave select) pin used to control the shift-register latch. It is marked CS on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
SktiBckvL.label: CS

ry-PcXIsv8.description: Makes the octofet react to incoming values while `ACT` is true
ry-PcXIsv8.label: ACT

@/octofet-16.description: Represents two Octofet boards connected in a daisy-chain.

BkiKgm3iv8.description: Makes the octofet react to incoming values while `ACT` is true
BkiKgm3iv8.label: ACT

ByYFlXnsvI.description: The MOSI (Master Out Slave In) pin used to send data to the peripherals. It is marked DI on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
ByYFlXnsvI.label: MOSI

HyOtg72sPI.description: The clock pin used to clock pulses which synchronize data transmission generated by the master. It is marked П on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
HyOtg72sPI.label: SCK

rJctxQhiP8.description: The chip select (also known as slave select) pin used to control the shift-register latch. It is marked CS on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
rJctxQhiP8.label: CS

@/octofet-24.description: Represents three Octofet boards connected in a daisy-chain.

HJ9rPmCjPI.description: The chip select (also known as slave select) pin used to control the shift-register latch. It is marked CS on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
HJ9rPmCjPI.label: CS

SJtSPQCsDI.description: The MOSI (Master Out Slave In) pin used to send data to the peripherals. It is marked DI on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
SJtSPQCsDI.label: MOSI

rkOSwQCovL.description: The clock pin used to clock pulses which synchronize data transmission generated by the master. It is marked П on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
rkOSwQCovL.label: SCK

rkjBv7RoDU.description: Makes the octofet react to incoming values while `ACT` is true
rkjBv7RoDU.label: ACT

@/octofet-device.description: Represents an Octofet board, which provides eight power switches (a.k.a. «channels»).

B1g0H4qkPI.description: The clock pin used to clock pulses which synchronize data transmission generated by the master. It is marked П on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
B1g0H4qkPI.label: SCK

Bk3HE9ywL.description: The chip select (also known as slave select) pin used to control the shift-register latch. It is marked CS on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
Bk3HE9ywL.label: CS

HyCSE9kDU.description: The MOSI (Master Out Slave In) pin used to send data to the peripherals. It is marked DI on the Octofet board. Use any GPIO pin of the controller.
HyCSE9kDU.label: MOSI

@/pack-bools-to-byte.description: Packages 8 booleans into a byte HEX value in range [0, FF].

@/write.description: Sets the state ("on" or "off") of 8 power switches on Octofet board.

@/write-byte.description: Sets the state ("on" or "off") of all 8 power switches at once on Octofet board.

SyW2yhovI.description: Values for all of 8 power switches packed into a single byte. MSB first.
SyW2yhovI.label: DATA
